channel.title: A question?
channel.description:
Hello guys. I was curious, how do I create items for an open source client. Like, say I want a steel sword, but i want it green and stronger. I know i can make it stronger using the server settings. But, how would I re-color the sword. Would I use a picture editor (like photo shop, or Gimp) to open the texture for the sword or does it take a completely different program?
Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks in advance! :)

item.title: A question?
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Thank you Dan! I would rep you but hehe yah, gotta get my own rep to 15. Thanks a million!

Read full topic

item.title: A question?
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

well i dnt know n e thing about coding but heres a link that will show you how to recolour items

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

donno if this will help you fully but it helped me alot in grasping that fact of making models and stuff like that client side!

hope this helped
dan x
